Notezz is a simple note taking application where you can take notes online without having to worry about installing, customizing, learning, getting-used-to, paying, security, privacy or anything else basically.
Originally created by Chirstopher Lindblom, Notezz is now run and maintained by Sushil Gupta as a side project. First version of Notezz was started in 2006 and since then more than 50,000 notes have been created by more than 10,000 users and growing slowly everyday.
Notezz is not a commercial project, and as such, there is no monetization done in Notezz in anyway whatsoever and will likely remain so for the foreseeable future.
Feel free to send us a quick email at support@notezz.com if you are facing any issues or just want to say hi and we'll be happy to get back to you.
You can also find us on Twitter at @Notezzapp.
